mapper.select: select count(*) FROM qna WHERE use_flag='Y' and qes_mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.update: update qna set use_flag = 'N', qes_mod_date = now() WHERE 1=1 and qes_mem_no = #{mem_no} and qna_no = #{qna_no}
